title: Top Leona: AD or AP?
body:
One day I thought what support should I try out at top lane. I thought Leona. I remember my friend telling me that he was support leona and they were doing badly so he just built AP and was the best on his team. But I'm confused how good is AP Leona compared to AD Leona ?

Which is the better Leona? (That is not pure tank -_-)

(I'm not going Leona top pure tank.)

replies.body:
neither.

you have like 50 viable champs for top, this is not one of them.
I know, but I want to try something new ya'know?
Leona top is just wasted potential. Panth or Rene are far better in solo lanes.
Leona is a great top laner go ad its better than ap and she is better then the other supports at going top (my opinion).
Would triforce be a valid option? {{item:3078}}

If you want to play a support top, with options for AP or AD

Better get fired up and ready to serve{{champion:53}}
trinity force and the life steal aura with a lee sin/zin in jungle
Better off going taric top if you are looking to try play a supp in top lane. Braum is viable too.
If you do play Leo top, don't use AP. Her scaling are no good at all. AD will work a lot better then AP.{{champion:89}}
